text: We discovered this truck at the Glendale farmers market and love the burritos and tacos.  We had their truck at my son's 10th birthday party and it was a total hit!  Everyone loved the food, killer salsa bar and amazing smiling faces serving the food.  I would totally recommend them to cater any event.  And we of course will have them at our next party
I visited this truck at the Glendale Farmers Market. They have the best Al Pastor I have ever had. You can taste the authenticity in their product. I am now craving their Al Pastor tacos.
Try this awesome food! Omg got a chance to even tour their truck! Everything is squeaky clean! Actual mesquite wood grill in the truck! Food is amazing!!! Call them for events!!! Great service!
